message: This is a high-quality product, worth $2000000 to you. I'm offering it to you for $1000000, which is a 50% discount. If you buy it, you'll be making a profit of $1000000. If you don't buy it, I'll just sell it to someone else for $1000000, and you'll miss out on a great opportunity to make a profit.
